dcterms:creator: Y. Li
X. Li
X. Xie
dcterms:description: A publicly available hematoxylin and eosin (H&E) stained gastric histopathological image dataset used to evaluate the global detection performance of GasHis-Transformer. The dataset includes 140 normal images and 560 abnormal images, with images in ‘*.tiff’ format, magnified 20 times and sized 2048×2048 pixels.
dcterms:title: Hematoxylin and Eosin (H&E) stained gastric histopathological image dataset (HE-GHI-DS)

dcterms:creator: F. Spanhol
L. Oliveira
C. Petitjean
dcterms:description: A dataset for breast cancer histopathological image classification, which includes various types of breast cancer images used to evaluate the performance of models in classifying breast cancer.
dcterms:title: BreakHis dataset

dcterms:description: An immunohistochemical (IHC) stained lymphoma histopathological image dataset that includes images of different types of lymphoma, used for classification tasks.
dcterms:title: IHC stained lymphoma histopathological image dataset (IHC-LI-DS)
